snippet.title: 'Batman - The Telltale Series' - Behind The Scenes
snippet.description:
In this behind the scenes look at Batman - The Telltale Series, hear from the voices of Bruce Wayne/Batman (Troy Baker), Selina Kyle/Catwoman (Laura Bailey) and Harvey Dent (Travis Willingham) on their process in bringing these iconic characters to life with a fresh spin, as well as the exciting and challenging experience of performing in an interactive narrative.

Batman - The Telltale Series Episode 2: 'Children of Arkham' is now available on PC/Mac, PlayStation 4 and Xbox One
